players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Diana. Alice was the last to see her alive. Maybe she did it. Bob, you always act suspicious."
You: "Charlie, you singled out Alice. That is a typical mafia move. I think you might be the mafioso. Bob, any thoughts?"
Bob: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. I'm the detective."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie—he is mafia. Alice, you saw him and Charlie tried to deflect. Vote Charlie. The only suspect left is the mafia."
You: "Charlie singled me out – a classic mafia tactic. Bob says he’s the detective and that Charlie is mafia; if true, that’s the only suspect left. I’m more suspicious of Bob. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob, I suspect your detective claim. If you were honest, you would know me. Perhaps you are the mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Diana. Alice was the last to see her alive. Maybe she did it. Bob, you always act suspicious."
Alice: "Charlie, you singled out Alice. That is a typical mafia move. I think you might be the mafioso. Bob, any thoughts?"
You: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. I'm the detective."
You: "I investigated Charlie—he is mafia. Alice, you saw him and Charlie tried to deflect. Vote Charlie. The only suspect left is the mafia."
Alice: "Charlie singled me out – a classic mafia tactic. Bob says he’s the detective and that Charlie is mafia; if true, that’s the only suspect left. I’m more suspicious of Bob. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob, I suspect your detective claim. If you were honest, you would know me. Perhaps you are the mafia. Vote Bob."
